mapper.insert: insert into user (openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time) values (#{openid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})

select.foreach: select COUNT(id) from user where create_time >= #{date} AND create_time < DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
select COUNT(id) from user where create_time < DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
